subject: URGENT: New SAE Report - Patient 112-004
body:
Hi David,

Please find the attached CIOMS form for a new Serious Adverse Event for patient 112-004 in the LUMA study (BIIB122/DNL151).

The event is severe dyskinesia. Please escalate for immediate review as per protocol.

Thank you,

Sarah Chen
Study Coordinator
UCSF Medical Center, Department of Neurology

subject: Fwd: URGENT: New SAE Report - Patient 112-004
body:
Team,

Please see the urgent SAE report from site 112 regarding patient 112-004.

Escalating for immediate medical and safety review.

Best regards,

David Miller
Clinical Research Associate
PRA Health Sciences
